text: Yara tadera rabera dake sara deya, tadera jan'ya rayeche srestha pratidana. Ara yara tamra dake sara deya na, yamine ya kichu ache tara sabatuku'i yadi tara malika hato ebam tara sathe samaparimana aro kichu'o hato tahale'o tara muktipanasbarupa ta dita [1]. Tadera'i hiseba habe kathora [2] ebam jahannama habe tadera abasa, ara seta kata nikrsta bisramasthala
